parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: 1-based row index, if more than one subassembly or weldment are dissolved; 0, if only one subassembly or weldment is dissolved

title: IBomTableAnnotation.RestoreRestructuredComponents
description: Restores the previously dissolved subassembly or weldment at the specified row index of this BOM table annotation.

parameters.name: RowIndex
parameters.description: 1-based row index, if more than one subassembly or weldment are dissolved; 0, if only one subassembly or weldment is dissolved

returns: True if the subassembly or weldment is restored, false if not
